title: A fairing for young-men and maids. If you'l take my advice, this I would have you do, then every young-man take his lass, and drink one pot or two. To the tune of, The Winchester wedding. This may be printed, R.P. / By Tobias Bowne.
author: Bowne, Tobias.
publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, at the Golden Ball in Pye-corner.,
